data.eml:eml: First record of the cicadas genus Orientopsaltria Kato, 1944 (Hemiptera: Cicadidae) from Vietnam, with description of one new species

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Pham, Thai-Hong, Nguyen, Thi Huyen, Constant, Jerome (2019): First record of the cicadas genus Orientopsaltria Kato, 1944 (Hemiptera: Cicadidae) from Vietnam, with description of one new species. Zootaxa 4603 (3): 575-582, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4603.3.10
